Text: Anyone know where to find any "The Newsroom" Season 3 torrents?

This is television at its best. Dark, cynical, and razor-sharp. Ken Finkleman is self-absorbed and self-obsessed, but it works.

If you enjoy this you might want to look for More Tears, another Finkleman series.

Thank you for this torrent.
